amendment.description: To strike the request for a presidential proclamation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 139 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 139 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S2501; text: CR S2501) To strike the request for a presidential proclamation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 139 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Craig.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 139 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
